questions.question_text: What represents an example of tags and attributes identified by a partial selector?

choices.A:
<html app='chrome.exe' title-ACME System 1 - Log In' />
<webctrl tag='INPUT' type='email' />
choices.C:
<wnd app='powerpnt.exe' cls='PPTFrameClass' title='Presentation2 - PowerPoint' />
<uia name='Title TextBox' role='textbox' />
choices.D:
<wnd app='applicationframehost.exe' title='Calculator' />
<uia automationid='NumberPad' cls='NamedContainerAutomationPeer' name='Number pad' />
<uia automationid='num8Button' cls='Button' name='Eight' />

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is the right ans. as it doesn't contain the top level info
I think it is B too because Partial selectors does not have the top window of selectors.

Selected Answer: B
The given answer is correct

choices.B:
Create a Credential asset with the Global Value disabled.
Add a row in the Settings sheet in Config.xlsx with the name of the Orchestrator asset.
choices.A:
Create a Credential asset with the Global Value disabled.
Add a row in the Assets sheet in Config.xlsx with the name of the Orchestrator asset.
choices.C:
Create a Credential asset with the Global Value enabled.
Add a row in the Assets sheet in Config.xlsx with the name of the Orchestrator asset.
choices.D:
Create a Credential asset with the Global Value enabled.
Add a row in the Settings sheet in Config.xlsx with the name of the Orchestrator asset.

questions.question_text:
A developer created an automation project in the Robotic Enterprise (RE) Framework which needs to log into a website using different credentials depending on the account and machine it runs on. If the value is not defined for the account and machine, the developer needs the process to throw an error. For security reasons, the credentials for the login are stored in Orchestrator as Credential Assets with the Value Per Account-Machine option.
Which steps should the developer perform to use the Orchestrator asset in the project?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A is the right ans.

questions.question_text: Based on UiPath best practices, which project layout is recommended for processes with complex transitions in UiPath Studio?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C is the ans.

Selected Answer: C
C and B can be correct
Subjective answer can be also B

questions.question_text:
A developer is creating a process using the Dispatcher and Performer model. The Dispatcher is built in the Robotic Enterprise (RE) Framework and it needs to add data from a datatable to a queue.
Based on the UiPath best practices, which type of design is best-suited for the automation of this Dispatcher?

A developer wants to create an unattended automation process. The process will take information from emails that are located in a centralized mailbox. The developer needs to use the mail folder, port, server, username, and password values. No email client is available on the unattended machine.
Which activity can be used to retrieve unread emails with the subject line "Email for Robot"?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Just the Activity "Get IMAP Mail Messages" has server an port properties !

Selected Answer: B
The given answer is correct
